channel.title: Need help with commands

item.title: Need help with commands
item.dc:creator: @_MOAD `MOAD
item.description:
@_MOAD wrote:

[quote=“sara pkaz, post:9, topic:252824”]if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 0 && action < 1){ if (inCombat == true) { sM("You are not aloud to Spawn! in combat!"); String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

This stops them from spawning in combat.[/quote]

That would cause errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with commands
item.dc:creator: @sara_pkaz sara pkaz
item.description:
@sara_pkaz wrote:

if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 0 && action < 1){ if (inCombat == true) { sM("You are not aloud to Spawn! in combat!"); String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

This stops them from spawning in combat.

item.description:

if (command.startsWith("pickup")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); }

item.title: Need help with commands
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

     }

        if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 0)) {
            try {
                int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
                int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

                if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                    addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                } else {
                    sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("errror message! ");
            }
        }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with commands
item.dc:creator: @icyspecz icyspecz
item.description:
@icyspecz wrote:

i can’t seem to get ::pickup items for normal players to work.

here’s the code:

                    }
    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 0) {
	        String[] args = command.split(" ");
         if(args.length == 3) {
		int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
		int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
		if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
			addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
		} else {
			sM("No such item.");
		}
	} else {
		sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100");
	}

Read full topic
